content:
Did you know you can colorize and print all IP addresses and interfaces on Linux in a tabular format for better readability?
The syntax is:
1 2 ip -br -c addr show ip -br -c link show Source: https://mastodon.social/@nixCraft/113679576456152013
title: Colorize IP

content:
Source Get it from this repo made by Benexl : https://github.com/Benexl/yt-x
Basic commands 1 2 3 4 5 # launch the ui yt-x # edit your config yt-x -e YouTube video
title: YT-X
